org.ligoj.app.resource.node

Class ParameterValueResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ligoj.app.resource.node.ParameterValueResource

  • @Service
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="/node")
public class ParameterValueResource
extends java.lang.Object
    Criteria values Business Layer for entity ParameterValue

    • Method Detail

      • toVo

        public ParameterValueVo toVo(ParameterValue entity)
        ParameterValue JPA to business object transformer.
        Parameters:
        entity - The parameter value.
        Returns:
        The parameter value with parameter definition.

      • parseValue

        public static <T> T parseValue(ParameterValue entity,
                               BasicParameterValueVo vo)
        Parse the raw data to the target type and return this value.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The object type resolved during the parsing.
        Parameters:
        entity - ParameterValue to be parsed.
        vo - Target object receiving the typed value.
        Returns:
        the parsed and typed value.

      • toData

        public static java.lang.String toData(BasicParameterValueVo vo)
        Return the data String from the true data value.
        Parameters:
        vo - The object to convert.
        Returns:
        The String data to persist.

      • delete

        public void delete(int id)
        Delete a ParameterValue. A value can be deleted only where there is no subscription on the related node, or the related parameter is not mandatory.
        Parameters:
        id - The entity's identifier.

      • update

        public void update(ParameterValueNodeUpdateVo vo)
        Update a ParameterValue. Visibility of value and related parameter is checked. Only value attached to a Node can be updated. The related node cannot be updated. A parameter used in a subscription cannot be updated.
        Parameters:
        vo - ParameterValueCreateVo to update. Identifier is required.

      • create

        public int create(ParameterValueNodeVo vo)
        Create a new ParameterValue to a node. The related node must be visible and writable for the current user.
        Parameters:
        vo - new ParameterValueCreateVo to persist.
        Returns:
        The new identifier.

      • checkOwnership

        public void checkOwnership(Parameter parameter,
                           Node node)
        Check the parameter is related to the given node.
        Parameters:
        parameter - The parameter to check.
        node - The node scope the parameter must be related to.

      • getNonSecuredSubscriptionParameters

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getNonSecuredSubscriptionParameters(int subscription)
        Return non secured parameters values related to the subscription. Secured parameters are not returned.
        Parameters:
        subscription - The subscription identifier.
        Returns:
        secured associated parameters values. Key of returned map is the identifier of Parameter

      • getSubscriptionParameters

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getSubscriptionParameters(int subscription)
        Return all parameters values related to the subscription. Secured (encrypted) parameters are decrypted.
        Parameters:
        subscription - The subscription identifier.
        Returns:
        all associated parameters values. Key of returned map is the identifier of Parameter

      • create

        public void create(java.util.List<ParameterValueCreateVo> values,
                   Subscription subscription)
        Create the given subscription parameter values. Value validity is checked.
        Parameters:
        values - the parameter values to persist.
        subscription - The related subscription.

      • create

        public void create(java.util.List<ParameterValueCreateVo> values,
                   Node node)
        Create the given node parameter values.
        Parameters:
        values - the parameter values to persist.
        node - The related node.

      • update

        public void update(java.util.List<ParameterValueCreateVo> values,
                   Node node)
        Update the given node parameter values. The old not updated values are deleted.
        Parameters:
        values - the parameter values to persist.
        node - The related node.

      • deleteBySubscription

        public void deleteBySubscription(int subscription)
        Delete all parameter values associated to given subscription.
        Parameters:
        subscription - the associated subscription to delete.

      • deleteByNode

        public void deleteByNode(java.lang.String node)
        Delete all parameter values associated to given node.
        Parameters:
        subscription - the associated subscription to delete.

      • toMapValues

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> toMapValues(java.util.List<ParameterValue> values)
        Transform List to Map where key is the parameter name. Secured parameters are decrypted.
        Parameters:
        values - The parameters list.
        Returns:
        the corresponding key/values. Never null.

      • toMap

        public <K extends java.io.Serializable,V extends org.springframework.data.domain.Persistable<K>> java.util.Map<K,V> toMap(java.lang.Iterable<V> items)
        Transform List to Map where K is the item's identifier, and VALUE is the original item.
        Parameters:
        items - The items list.
        Returns:
        the corresponding map.

      • getNodeParameters

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getNodeParameters(java.lang.String node)
        Return the parameters of given node. Not exposed as web-service since secured data are clearly exposed. The result is cached.
        Parameters:
        node - the node identifier.
        Returns:
        the parameters of given node as Map.

      • getNodeParameters

        @GET
 @Path(value="{node:.+:.*}/parameter-value/{mode}")
public java.util.List<ParameterNodeVo> getNodeParameters(@PathParam(value="node")
                                                                                                                  java.lang.String node,
                                                                                                                  @PathParam(value="mode")
                                                                                                                  org.ligoj.app.api.SubscriptionMode mode)
        Return all node parameter definitions where a value is expected to be provided to the final subscription. When defined, the current value is specified.
        Parameters:
        node - The node identifier.
        mode - Subscription mode.
        Returns:
        All parameter definitions where a value is expected to be attached to the final subscription in given mode.
